results.title: The Australian Dream
results.creator_credit: Virginia Whitwell, Sarah Thomson, Stan Grant, Nick Batzias, John Battsek, Daniel Gordon, Good Thing Productions and Passion Pictures
results.brief_description: The Australian Dream is a theatrical feature documentary that uses the remarkable and inspirational story of AFL legend Adam Goodes as the prism through which to tell a deeper and more powerful story about race, identity and belonging.

constellations_other.name: Culture and identity on the Australian screen
constellations_other.description: Australian screen culture is distinctive, unexpected, playful and serious when it matters. Indigenous productions make a huge contribution to the unique identity of the Australian moving image.

results.creator_credit_for_label: Virginia Whitwell, Sarah Thomson, Stan Grant, Nick Batzias, John Battsek, Daniel Gordon, Good Thing Productions and Passion Pictures
results.description: AFL legend Adam Goodes shares the story of his life and career to offer a deeper insight into race, identity, and belonging.
description_for_label: AFL legend Adam Goodes shares the story of his life and career to offer a deeper insight into race, identity, and belonging.

results.title: The AC!D Reign Chronicles
results.brief_description: Grimes and Hana come 2 gther w Mac on a 2 week tour in Europe where they film 7 music videos.

constellations_other.name: A handheld aesthetic
constellations_other.description: Looking at the use of handycams and other consumer level devices in moving image works.

results.description: Grimes and Hana come 2 gther w Mac on a 2 week tour in Europe where they film 7 music videos.
description_for_label: Grimes and Hana come 2 gther w Mac on a 2 week tour in Europe where they film 7 music videos.

results.title: Redfern Now
results.brief_description: Redfern Now is a kaleidoscopic drama that explores this inner-city suburb and the people who inhabit it. The highly celebrated and multi award-winning drama series written, directed and produced by Indigenous creatives.

constellations_other.name: Jedda: Uneven ground, the road to on-screen diversity
constellations_other.description: Jedda was the first fully funded Australian feature to be shot on colour film. It was also the first Australian film with Aboriginal actors in lead roles, however, it reflects a deeply problematic time in Australian history.

constellations_other.name: The secret life of suburbia and music videos
constellations_other.description: Australia's famous streets and suburbs have defined music videos, TV shows and miniseries, providing a unique backdrop to Australian stories and music.

constellations_other.name: Landscape as Character
constellations_other.description: The landscape is often a character in Australian films. Usually, it's a villain that represents our problematic national character and is increasingly used to challenge our troubled history and explore our evolving identities.

constellations_other.name: Canopy
constellations_other.description: John Harvey is a Torres Strait Islander producer, director and writer in screen and stage whose work Canopy celebrates Indigenous self-representation.

constellations_other.name: Aboriginal History Archive
constellations_other.description: The Aboriginal History Archive at Victoria University, led by Gary Foley, is dedicated to the collection and preservation of First Peoples' stories and cultural material. The political activism of the Black Power movement in the 1970s is intersected with representation of Aboriginal actors on screen.

results.description: Redfern Now is a kaleidoscopic drama that explores this inner-city suburb and the people who inhabit it. The highly celebrated and multi award-winning drama series written, directed and produced by Indigenous Australians
description_for_label: Redfern Now is a kaleidoscopic drama that explores this inner-city suburb and the people who inhabit it. The highly celebrated and multi award-winning drama series written, directed and produced by Indigenous Australians

video_links.name: Redfern Now | Starts 8.30pm on Thursday, 1 Nov 2012, ABC1

results.title: Polyester
results.creator_credit: Van Smith, John Waters and New Line Cinema
results.headline_credit: United States and United States of America, 1981
results.brief_description: A comedy melodrama of the tragic life of Francine Fishpaw (Divine), an obese housewife whose mere existence burdens her so-called loved ones. Mistreated by her husband Elmer, who runs the local porn theatre and money-hungry mother, La Rue, she turns to the bottle.

constellations_other.name: Supplementing cinema
constellations_other.description: A celebration of b-grade cinema's never-ending quest for more, more, more.

results.creator_credit_for_label: Van Smith, John Waters and New Line Cinema
results.headline_credit_for_label: United States and United States of America, 1981
results.description: A suburban housewife’s world falls apart when her pornographer husband admits he’s serially unfaithful to her, her daughter gets pregnant, and her son is suspected of being the foot-fetishist who’s been breaking local women’s feet.
description_for_label: A suburban housewife’s world falls apart when her pornographer husband admits he’s serially unfaithful to her, her daughter gets pregnant, and her son is suspected of being the foot-fetishist who’s been breaking local women’s feet.

details.label: Subject categories
display_values: Feature films → Feature films - United States

results.title: Pierrot le Fou
results.brief_description: Pierrot escapes his boring society and travels from Paris to the Mediterranean Sea with Marianne, a girl chased by hit-men from Algeria. They lead an unorthodox life, always on the run.

constellations_other.name: All about Agnes
constellations_other.description: Belgian director Agnes Varda was the only female director in the French New Wave movement and is known for her long career across influential documentary and dramas, and for her trademark humour, curiosity and insight.

constellations_other.name: Gunslingers, good fellas and flea bags
constellations_other.description: Explore how a 1903 western changed the course of filmmaking and videogames by breaking the fourth wall.

results.description: Pierrot escapes his boring society and travels from Paris to the Mediterranean Sea with Marianne, a girl chased by hit-men from Algeria. They lead an unorthodox life, always on the run.
description_for_label: Pierrot escapes his boring society and travels from Paris to the Mediterranean Sea with Marianne, a girl chased by hit-men from Algeria. They lead an unorthodox life, always on the run.

results.title: Monkeyshines, No. 1
results.creator_credit: William Heise, William K.L. Dickson and Edison Manufacturing Company
results.brief_description: Monkeyshines, No. 1 was shot by William K. L. Dickson and William Heise for the Edison labs. The series were filmed in the format of the Kinetoscope, and are believed to be the first films shot in the United States.

constellations_other.name: Innovation, technology and design: Edweard Muybridge
constellations_other.description: A focus on the discovery, inspiration and innovation at the heart of moving image history

results.creator_credit_for_label: William Heise, William K.L. Dickson and Edison Manufacturing Company
results.description: Experimental film made to test the original cylinder format of the Kinetoscope and believed to be the first film shot in the United States. It shows a blurry figure in white standing in one place making large gestures and is only a few seconds long.
description_for_label: Experimental film made to test the original cylinder format of the Kinetoscope and believed to be the first film shot in the United States. It shows a blurry figure in white standing in one place making large gestures and is only a few seconds long.

results.title: Manifesto
results.creator_credit: Julian Rosefeldt, Schiwago Film and Bayerischer Rundfunk
results.brief_description: Julian Rosefeldt’s outstanding tribute to various art manifestos of the 19th and 20th century, ranging from Communism to Dogme, in connection with 13 different characters played by Cate Blanchett. A striking humorous audio-visual experience.

constellations_other.name: Clones, doubles and doppelgangers
constellations_other.description: Multiple characters and doubles materialise in this Constellation inspired by the pioneering special effects of Georges Méliès.

results.creator_credit_for_label: Julian Rosefeldt, Schiwago Film and Bayerischer Rundfunk
results.description: An outstanding tribute to various (art) manifestos of the nineteenth and twentieth century, ranging from Communism to Dogme, in connection with thirteen different characters, including a homeless man, a factory worker and a corporate CEO, who are all played by Cate Blanchett. A striking humorous audio-visual experience.
description_for_label: An outstanding tribute to various (art) manifestos of the nineteenth and twentieth century, ranging from Communism to Dogme, in connection with thirteen different characters, including a homeless man, a factory worker and a corporate CEO, who are all played by Cate Blanchett. A striking humorous audio-visual experience.

results.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
results.brief_description: In the criminal justice system, sexually-based offenses are considered especially heinous. In New York City, the dedicated detectives who investigate these vicious felonies are members of an elite squad known as the Special Victims Unit. These are their stories.

constellations_other.name: Fight for your right
constellations_other.description: Real world revolution and the fictional representations that reflect the struggle for equality in the past, present and dystopian future.

results.description: In the criminal justice system, sexually-based offenses are considered especially heinous. In New York City, the dedicated detectives who investigate these vicious felonies are members of an elite squad known as the Special Victims Unit. These are their stories.
description_for_label: In the criminal justice system, sexually-based offenses are considered especially heinous. In New York City, the dedicated detectives who investigate these vicious felonies are members of an elite squad known as the Special Victims Unit. These are their stories.

results.title: GoodFellas
results.creator_credit: Richard Bruno, Nicholas Pileggi, Irwin Winkler, Kristi Zea, Martin Scorsese and Winkler Films
results.headline_credit: United States and United States of America, 1990
results.brief_description: Considered to be one of Scorsese’s finest – and most disturbing – films, Goodfellas explores a world where mobsters ruled the roost, splashed the cash, controlled the cops and provided glamorous role models – before it comes crashing down.

constellations_other.name: Gunslingers, good fellas and flea bags
constellations_other.description: Explore how a 1903 western changed the course of filmmaking and videogames by breaking the fourth wall.

constellations_other.name: Culture, food and family
constellations_other.description: Food as a link to culture and family.

results.creator_credit_for_label: Richard Bruno, Nicholas Pileggi, Irwin Winkler, Kristi Zea, Martin Scorsese and Winkler Films
results.headline_credit_for_label: United States and United States of America, 1990
results.description: The true story of Henry Hill, a half-Irish, half-Sicilian Brooklyn kid who is adopted by neighbourhood gangsters at an early age and climbs the ranks of a Mafia family under the guidance of Jimmy Conway.
description_for_label: The true story of Henry Hill, a half-Irish, half-Sicilian Brooklyn kid who is adopted by neighbourhood gangsters at an early age and climbs the ranks of a Mafia family under the guidance of Jimmy Conway.

results.title: Forrest Gump
results.creator_credit: Charles Newirth and The Steve Tisch Company
results.brief_description: Tom Hanks stars as one of the most memorable characters in cinematic history, Forrest Gump, the big-hearted man who was there in the biggest moments in American history. Directed by Robert Zemeckis and written by Eric Roth won six Academy Awards.

constellations_other.name: Dismissing the truth
constellations_other.description: The dismissal of Gough Whitlam by Governor-General Sir John Kerr is one of the most controversial moments in Australian politics. Whitlam’s rebuttal imploring the electorate to ‘maintain the rage’ was immortalised on TV and took on the gravitas of Shakespearean tragedy.

constellations_other.name: Nadia Tass
constellations_other.description: Comedic and cult classics take centre stage in Nadia Tass' career.

results.creator_credit_for_label: Charles Newirth and The Steve Tisch Company
results.description: A man with a low IQ has accomplished great things in his life and been present during significant historic events—in each case, far exceeding what anyone imagined he could do. But despite all he has achieved, his one true love eludes him.
description_for_label: A man with a low IQ has accomplished great things in his life and been present during significant historic events—in each case, far exceeding what anyone imagined he could do. But despite all he has achieved, his one true love eludes him.
